channel.title: What is MySQL?
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section...
So basically, I'm playing a server that's dying atm. A new owner is taking over & apparently he's going to put 'MySQL' in the server, told to me by a mod who just got demoted. I heard that MySQL can hack into people's shit? If yes, please explain how & the possibilities...

item.title: What is MySQL?
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

When people using the term of adding mysql they think of
Vote4Cash
Auto Donations
HighScores etc,
I dobut this new owner has intentions to hack players.

Read full topic

item.title: What is MySQL?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

MySQL

MySQL (officially pronounced as /maɪ ˌɛskjuːˈɛl/ "My S-Q-L",) is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS). Its name is a combination of "My", the name of co-founder Michael Widenius's daughter, and "SQL", the abbreviation for Structured Query Language. The MySQL development project has made its source code available under the terms of the GNU General Public License, as well as under a variety of proprietary agreements. MySQL was owned and sponsored by a single for-pro MySQL is...

Read full topic
